uvi.product_version: versions from v5.10 to before v5.15
uvi.description:
drm: mxsfb: Fix NULL pointer dereference crash on unload

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15 by commit 3cfc183052c3dbf8eae57b6c1685dab00ed3db4a, it was introduced in version v5.10 by commit ae1ed0093281939b80664a687689f12436c0e874. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm: mxsfb: Fix NULL pointer dereference crash on unload
